casebody.data:
*Heyman vs. The State of Georgia.

[Wabkeb, Chief Justice, being engaged as presiding officer of the senate organized as-a court of impeachment, did not sit in this case.]

This case is ruled hy the case of Newman vs. The State, decided at this-term.

No reports or opinions are published in the following cases under the provisions of act of March 2, 1875. (R.)

 Jackson, Justice.
